title: Love and the Ghosts of Mount Kinabalu: And Other Stories of Malaysia
description: When a young man's hopes to reunite with an ex-lover in Borneo evaporate, he goes on a journey to find himself in the rotting jungles. Meanwhile, a mountain said to be a place of ancestral spirits beckons from behind a shroud of clouds.This volume contains three works of creative nonfiction set in Malaysia:*Why Climb a Mountain? - a narrative essay*Love and the Ghosts of Mount Kinabalu - a story in six chapters*Confessions of a Culture-shocked Alien - a story told in letters+19 luscious photographs and illustrations
author: B.T. Newberg
